html: (Mosiah 14:12)."Therefore will I divide him a portion with the great." Jesus Christ "continued from grace to grace, until he received a fulness… . [H]e received all power, both in heaven and on earth, and the glory of the Father was with him, for he dwelt in him." (D&C 93:13-17.) Thus, He whose name was a key element in the original title of the Melchizedek Priesthood even "the Holy Priesthood, after the Order of the Son of God"(D&C 107:3) qualified first and foremost for the great promise given to those who honor that priesthood: to receive "all that [the] Father hath." (D&C 84:33-40.) In the words of the apostle Paul, He "thought it not robbery to be equal with God." (Philippians 2:6.)
